Articles.Content:
So, I'm trying to dock two modules I landed on the Mun, I took the precaution to make sure the landing legs lined up exactly with the docking ports on both craft. Despite over an hour of effort now, I cannot see to get them to make friends. I have some reservations about the necessary alignment accuracy required for two ships to be considered docked, because, well:

I don't really know what else I need to do to prove that these two modules are docked :\ any suggestions?
